content: 1995 Singaporean TV series or program ***The Golden Pillow*** ([simplified Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 金枕头; [traditional Chinese](/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_characters): 金枕頭) is a 40-episode epic drama produced by the [Television Corporation of Singapore](/wiki/Television_Corporation_of_Singapore) (now [MediaCorp](/wiki/Mediacorp)) in 1995. ## Synopsis The story is about Ren Niang, who attempts to find success and happiness in his life. Born in Thailand, Ren Niang goes to Singapore in search of his long-lost biological father Sai Qilin and gets entangled in a love triangle along the way. He chances upon a mysterious "golden pillow" rumoured to possess magical powers. Part of the plot involves various characters trying to get their hands on the golden pillow. ## Legacy The series was one of earliest Singaporean drama series to be filmed on location overseas (part of it was filmed in [Europe](/wiki/Europe)). At the [Star Awards 2007](/wiki/Star_Awards_2007) anniversary special celebrating 25 years of local Chinese television, the scene of [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong), [Zoe Tay](/wiki/Zoe_Tay) and [Alex Man](/wiki/Alex_Man) "listening" to the golden pillow was named one of the top 5 most memorable scenes. [Xie Shaoguang](/wiki/Xie_Shaoguang)'s character Sai Wei was voted one of the top 10 most memorable villains. ## Awards AccoladesAwardNomineeResultStar Awards 1996 Show 2[Best Supporting Actress](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Supporting_Actress) 最佳女配角[Yang Libing](/wiki/Yang_Libing) 杨莉冰NominatedStar Awards 1996 Show 2[Best Actress](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Actress) 最佳女主角[Zoe Tay](/wiki/Zoe_Tay) 郑惠玉WonStar Awards 1996 Show 2[Best Supporting Actor](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Supporting_Actor) 最佳男配角[Xie Shaoguang](/wiki/Xie_Shaoguang) 谢韶光WonStar Awards 1996 Show 2[Best Supporting Actor](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Supporting_Actor) 最佳男配角[Zhang Xinxiang](/wiki/Zhang_Xinxiang)NominatedStar Awards 1996 Show 2[Best Drama Serial](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Drama_Serial) 最佳电视剧—N/aNominated - *The Golden Pillow* (English) on Mediacorp website - *The Golden Pillow* (Chinese) on Mediacorp website This drama television program–related article is a stub.
